title: Trintavon's very very boring author page
content:
**My SCPs... I guess...**
[[[SCP-8699]]] : Every Day I See You Still (8kcon entry)
[[[SCP-7965]]] : Soda Royale (goblincon entry)
[[[SCP-7962]]] : Golden Enlightenment
[[[SCP-7795]]] : Đ is for Đirteen
[[[SCP-7699]]] : Our Quiet Death (written alongside [[*user Jack Waltz]])
[[[SCP-7248]]] : Sail. Chase. Plunder. (written alongside [[*user Fishish]], article one for the year of Trintish Fishavon)
[[[SCP-7227]]] : The Other Alex Thorley (art exchange gift for [[*user Prime Girl]])
[[[SCP-7037]]] : Lucky Clover (7kcon entry, first article)
[[[SCP-7013]]] : Thirteen Indeed (idea by me, written by users [[*user Fishish]] and [[*user Jack Waltz]])
[[[SCP-5283]]] : Please Nerf Nerf

**My Tales... I guess...**
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-173-but 173 But...] (written alongside [[*user tstaffor]])
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-173-but-it-s-a-collaborative-log 173 But... it's a collaborative log] (collaborative page established by myself and [[*user tstaffor]])
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/a-damned-memory A Damned Memory] (coldpostcon entry)
[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/pepsi-coke-territorial-holdings PSYCHE Internal DOcument 75-03718: PepsiCo/Coca-Cola Territorial Holdings] (written alongside [[*user Aftokrator]], [[*user AnActualCrow]], [[*user Cyvstvi]], [[*user Fishish]], [[*user GremlinGroup]], [[*user LightlessLantern]], [[*user Limeyy]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user Rakkran]], [[*user Ralliston]], and [[*user Trotskyeet]])
[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/rate-my-director Rate My Director] (written alongside [[*user Aftokrator]], [[*user AnActualCrow]], [[*user bigslothonmyface]], [[*user Cyvstvi]], [[*user DodoDevil]], [[*user Dysadron]], [[*user EmotionalEntropy]], [[*user Fishish]], [[*user GremlinGroup]], [[*user Grigori Karpin]], [[*user HarryBlank]], [[*user Its a Bad Idea]], [[*user J Dune]], [[*user JakdragonX]], [[*user LightlessLantern]], [[*user Limeyy]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user MrBadFellow]], [[*user OriTiefling]], [[*user Pedagon]], [[*user PlaguePJP]], [[*user pr0m37h3um]], [[*user R4_EX]], [[*user Ralliston]], [[*user Rounderhouse]], [[*user Snapdragon133]], [[*user stephlynch]], [[*user stormbreath]], and [[*user Trotskyeet]])
